page.title: 14ARABLE FARM MACHINERY
page.content: {TRACTORS}50-150hp.Two and four wheel- drive fitted with safety roll-bars or cabs. Cabs have special seats, hydraulic and electric controls for implements, heaters/air-conditioning with radio and C.B. on some. { {PLOUGHS}mostly reversible 3-8 furrows. {CULTIVATORS}fixed/springtine/powered rotors of various sorts. {DRILLS}combine drills, some pneumatic. {MOWERS}spinning cutting discs with conditioning rollers to aid wilting. {FORAGE HARVESTER}to chop and blow crop into trailers. {TEDDERS}with horizontal spinning tined rotors to spread and row up crops. {BALERS}producing rectangular or large cylindrical bales. Trailed bale stacker aids collection. {CEREAL HARVESTERS}(COMBINES) Cuts, threshes and carries up to 5 tons of grain before unloading into trailers.
